Description: Home was built in 1920 but everything else is Brand New in 2014!! Home sits on Approximately 1 acre but is surrounded by almost 140 acres more! For a long term lease owner will consider use of Barn(s) and will discuss Fencing in Pasture(s) for Horse(s). Call for details!
